channel.title: Posts on Jian Cui Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jian Cui Ph.D.

item.title: R programming for Foundations of Computational Biology
item.description: Introduction Advances: Very well maintained communities and detailed manuals. The Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN), a network of FTP and web servers around the world that store identical, up-to-date, versions of code and documentation for R. Bioconductor, tools for the analysis and comprehension of high-throughput genomic data. Bioconductor uses the R statistical programming language, and is open source and open development. Introductional documents: http://cran.
